data.text: Imagine the world we would live in and the number of wrongful convictions that will occur if the accusation of a crime is enough to destroy a persons life. Imagine the implications for men and women alike. You are in a unique and powerful position to present another viewpoint.

You’ve advocated for those who were wrongfully convicted of crimes. What is happening to Brett Kavanaugh and his family is an unprecedented attack on due process. Please speak out about this injustice. Your cultural influence is unparalleled and will help others see the truth.
